description:
This course prepares students with fundamental knowledge of using R, a powerful complete analytical environment, to organize, visualize, and analyze data. It
covers the machin learning techniques such as regression, classification, clustering, text analytics, LDA, and PCA, and their applications in business areas across HR, management, marketing, etc.

Through practicing the complete data analytics cycle, students to trained to be future ready, data sensitive, and data minded managers.
title: Business Analytics with R
